page.title: 01INTRO.GRID REF. 04400276
page.content: This 12 km area includes parts of Brandon, Bretford, Brinklow, Binley Woods, and Wolston. The main attractions are the Speedway - the home of the "Coventry Bees". The garden centre - Oakdale Nursery. We have two public houses - The Queen's Head and the Royal Oak both of which do meals and snacks. We boast one hotel - The Brandon Hall Hotel which has a 3 star rating. There are several farms in the area and two riding stables. Part of the Fosse Way (the Roman Road) runs through our area as does the river Avon. There are also two schools - Binley Woods Middle School,which takes pupils from the villages of Brandon,Wolston and Binley Woods.An elementary school still stands at Brandon but this was closed in 1969.
